car.select_additional_features: Select additional features and options available in this vehicle

descriptions.heated_seats: Electrically heated front and/or rear seats for comfort during cold weather
descriptions.keyless_entry: Allows entry to the vehicle without using a traditional key
descriptions.keyless_start: Start the engine with the push of a button without inserting a key
descriptions.power_mirrors: Electrically adjustable side mirrors with optional heating function
descriptions.power_steering: Hydraulic or electric power assistance for easier steering
descriptions.power_windows: Electric windows that can be raised or lowered with the touch of a button
descriptions.backup_camera: Rear-facing camera that displays the view behind the vehicle when reversing
descriptions.bluetooth: Wireless connectivity for hands-free calling and audio streaming
descriptions.cruise_control: Maintains a constant speed without keeping your foot on the accelerator
descriptions.navigation: Built-in GPS navigation system with maps and turn-by-turn directions
descriptions.sunroof: Glass panel in the roof that can be opened for fresh air and natural light
descriptions.leather_seats: Premium leather upholstery for enhanced comfort and luxury feel
descriptions.third_row_seats: Additional seating row for increased passenger capacity
descriptions.parking_sensors: Ultrasonic sensors that detect obstacles when parking
descriptions.lane_assist: Alerts the driver when the vehicle drifts out of its lane
descriptions.blind_spot: Monitors blind spots and alerts driver of vehicles in adjacent lanes
descriptions.apple_carplay: Integration with iPhone for seamless access to apps and features
descriptions.android_auto: Integration with Android devices for apps and Google services
descriptions.premium_audio: High-quality sound system with multiple speakers and enhanced audio
descriptions.remote_start: Start the engine remotely from outside the vehicle
descriptions.adaptive_cruise: Automatically adjusts speed to maintain safe distance from vehicles ahead
descriptions.auto_emergency_braking: Automatically applies brakes to prevent or reduce collision impact
descriptions.lane_keep_assist: Gently steers the vehicle to keep it centered in the lane
descriptions.parking_assist: Automated parking system that can park the vehicle with minimal driver input
descriptions.surround_view_camera: Multiple cameras provide a bird's-eye view around the entire vehicle
descriptions.heads_up_display: Projects important information onto the windshield in driver's line of sight
descriptions.wireless_charging: Charges compatible devices without cables using electromagnetic induction
descriptions.heated_steering_wheel: Steering wheel with built-in heating elements for cold weather comfort
descriptions.cooled_seats: Air-conditioned seats that provide cooling through perforated leather
descriptions.massaging_seats: Seats with built-in massage functions for enhanced comfort during long drives
